policyManagement: Manage policies, addendums and related documents
salesManagement: Manage leads, sales processes and track the entire sales cycle
claimsManagement: Register, track and manage claims throughout their lifecycle
financesManagement: Manage commissions, invoicing and financial statement processing
codebookManagement: Manage master data for clients, insurance companies and product codes
agentManagement: Manage agent commissions, calculate payouts and generate reports
reportsManagement: Generate customized reports for production, clients, agents and claims
settingsManagement: Configure system settings, user access and company information
